content: in this legal case a court in bari ruled in favor of the plaintiff after a 5year process the court granted the plaintiffs request to divide properties inherited from a deceased person they identified the specific properties and determined the shares each party is entitled to the court also ordered the sale of one property and the proceeds to be divided among the parties the defendant dropped their counterclaim the court discussed the right to division and the details of the division considering the evidence provided by the plaintiff and the agreement between the parties they determined the specific amounts each party must pay to adjust their shares the court also addressed the costs of the case including reimbursement of expenses and court costs which will be shared among the parties the court disregarded certain motions and exceptions and ultimately ruled in favor of the plaintiff they declared the plaintiffs right to obtain certain properties from the deceased persons estate the court ordered the plaintiff to pay certain amounts for property adjustments and also ordered the sale of another property with the proceeds divided among the parties the court rejected the plaintiffs demand for reimbursement and determined that the costs of the proceedings should be shared by all parties finally the court compensated the costs of the proceedings
